item.title: System Design
item.author: Sharad
item.description: Install the .NET Core SDK: First, you need to download and install the .NET Core SDK from the official website: https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download Create a new .NET Core project: Open a command prompt or terminal and navigate to the directory where you want to create your project. Then run the following command to create a new .NET Core project: javascript Copy code dotnet new webapi -n MyMicroservice This will create a new .
